definitions.definition: A horizontal structural beam that runs perpendicular to the primary support beams; a girder .
examples: The workman hung a light from a crossbeam between the main joists.

definitions.definition: A beam laid across the bitts , to which the cable is fastened when riding at anchor.

main_definition: A horizontal structural beam that runs perpendicular to the primary support beams; a girder .
secondary_definitions: ( nautical ) A beam laid across the bitts , to which the cable is fastened when riding at anchor.
